overview: When three couples arrive at the address for a retreat and spa, theyre shocked to discover just an average house. Once inside, the comedic camp counselor convinces the couples that the benefits of the camp outweigh the less than spa like surroundings. One by one, the couples are counseled and much to everyone`s surprise the magic works! Their love - along with their sex lives - are rekindled!
tagline: The sequel to the Award Winning Comedy!
title: Couples Camp 2
